name: Litnang in Hoboville
description:
Disclaimer: This game contains strong language, use of alcohol and sexual themes though no nudity is shown. 

As the day turns into noon, Litnang sits in his house. KNOCK! Someone's here. It's a guy with a star sticker saying that's he's a cop so he must be one. He tells you to get in his car to give you candy. He gives the candy but also takes all your money and leaves you stranded in Hoboville. Where will this adventure take you? Find out in Litnang in Hoboville.
